articles.title: Stock Market Today: Top 10 things to know before the market opens today - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Stock Market News: Trends in the SGX Nifty indicate a gap-up opening for the broader index in India with a gain of 161 points on Monday on the back of rally in the US and Asian markets and upbeat macro fundamentals
articles.content:
The market is expected to open in the green as trends in the SGX Nifty indicate a gap-up opening for the broader index in India with a gain of 161 points.

articles.title: Prince Harry says explosive book Spare is a bid to 'own my story' - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In an interview with Britain’s ITV network, defended his decision to publish the memoir after 38 years of “spin and distortion” by others.

articles.title: Thailand brings back Covid entry rules for all international travellers - The Star Online
articles.description: Thailand will reintroduce Covid-19 entry requirements for foreigners flying into the country from Monday (Jan 9), the nation’s transport minister said, as the South-East Asian nation prepares for an expected wave of tourists from China.
